explains: vt. 使无能力；使不能；使不适于

sentences.en: His poor health incapacitate him for work.
sentences.cn: 他健康不佳使他不能工作。

sentences.en: Poor eyesight will incapacitate you for a job in the library.
sentences.cn: 视力差将使你不适合于在图书馆工作。

sentences.en: That cynical calculation lies behind the design of many weapons that are intended to incapacitate rather than annihilate.
sentences.cn: 许多武器在设计时就运用了这种乖张的算计思维，它们的目的不是消灭敌人而是使敌人丧失作战能力。
